goal.en: “This course is aim to emphasize the the fundamentals of various spectroscopic techniques related to the identification of organic compounds. Also, students are expected to learn how to analyze the corresponding spectra for the strucutre identification.“
goal.ch: 俾使學生學習如何利用光譜技術鑑定有機化合物結構之基本原理與如何解析各類相關光譜圖。

content.en:
This course introduces: (a) the fundamentals of various spectroscopic techniques; (b) analysis skill of various spectra.
The scope of this course includes:
[1] Introduction/Basic Principles
[2] Infrared Spectroscopy
[3] NMR Spectroscopy
[4] Ultraviolet Spectroscopy
[5] Mass Spectrometry

en.competency: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch.competency: 具備研究領域之專業知識
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識
